message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I think a more even split is fair, given the diminishing value of the money.
Considering the inflation, I'll take a bit more this time, it's now or never!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but let's make a deal before the money becomes worthless for both of us.
